Patrick Steadman MD-PhD student at The University of Toronto

Tiny CV

  • Junior Fellow at Massey College from 2012-2017
  • MSc in Medical Biophysics completed with Dr. Jason Lerch at the Mouse Imaging Centre in 2013 - elaborated on here.
  • BSc in Medical and Health Physics from McMaster University in 2011 - I outlined the program here.
